rows.label: tlk41100141_05_msg0001
rows.name:
I... Vandham-san...
I'm so glad he was there to help us.

rows.label: tlk41100141_05_msg0002
rows.name:
If we'd gone to Acedia, we probably
wouldn't be alive now...

rows.label: tlk41100141_05_msg0003
rows.name:
Marveni was a two-faced grown-up,
wasn't he?

rows.label: tlk41100141_05_msg0004
rows.name:
With Vandham-san, at least you always
knew where you stood.

rows.label: tlk41100141_05_msg0005
rows.name:
I finally understand now. He was one
of the rare grown-ups you could trust...

rows.label: tlk41100141_05_msg0006
rows.name:
I'm glad to be here now. I'm so grateful
to Vandham-san...and to you too.
